column1: The following is a disclosure to the SEC. Write a {words} word interview with the CEO of this company who admits to lying about the two most important specific points in this disclosure and explains why with an embarrassing story that involves a {noun}. Start with a question from an interviewer. At the end of the text
column2: write the word "Title:" and then a dramatic 60 character summary in the style of the onion including the word {noun};The following is a disclosure to the SEC. Write a {words} word interview with the CEO of this company's spouse who tells the story of the CEO confessing to lying about two specific points in this disclosure because of a weird encounter with a {noun}. Start with a question from an interviewer. At the end of the text
column3: write the word "Title:" and then a dramatic 60 character summary in the style of the onion including the word {noun};The following is a disclosure to the SEC. Write a {words} word monologue from the perspective of the CEO's dog about how much more the CEO cares about playing with {noun} which makes the dog skeptical about the truth of one of the facts in this disclosure which the dog criticizes from the perspective of {famous_person}. At the end of the text
column4: write the word "Title:" and then a dramatic 60 character summary in the style of the onion
